DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe FX Face Paints - Metallic Aztec Gold 400 (30 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Wolfe Metallic Aztec Gold Face Paint is Wolfe Hydrocolor pearlescent face paint that gives a metallic sheen.
Wolfe Hydrocolor Face Paints have dense pigmentation providing brilliant color, opaque coverage, and easy application. Uniquely in the face paint world, Wolfe FX Hydrocolor makeup has a wax base so they flex with movement instead of cracking so your face paint designs stay beautiful for longer. Once applied, Wolfe face paint will not smear under normal circumstances, remain bright and colorful, and is comfortable to wear.
Wolfe 1.06 ounces (30 gm) face paint containers come in a screw-top stackable container for easy storage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1.06 ounces (30 gm) Wolfe Metallic Aztec Gold Face Paint Container is good for 50-200 applications
Metallic colors give a glistening effect to a face paint design
Wolfe paints go on smoothly and evenly and do not crack when dry
Easy to apply and easy to remove; just use soap and water
The 30 gram size comes in a screw top container and stacks easily for easy travel and storage
